name: active-lodash
description: A version of lodash customized to feel more like ActiveSupport (from Rails).

scripts.dev: npm run -s build && npm run -s test
scripts.prebuild: npm run -s check && npm run -s clean
scripts.build: npm run -s build-lodash && babel --optional runtime src -d dist
scripts.build-lodash: lodash modern strict exports=node minus=template -d -o lodash.custom.js
scripts.ci: npm install --ignore-scripts && npm run -s build && npm run -s test && npm run -s coverage
scripts.deploy: git pull --rebase origin master && git push origin master
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
